lead_paragraph: U.S. prosecutors on Thursday urged a federal appeals court to overturn a 2015 court ruling that sharply limited their ability to prosecute foreigners under a U.S. bribery law.
snippet: U.S. prosecutors on Thursday urged a federal appeals court to overturn a 2015 court ruling that sharply limited their ability to prosecute foreigners under a U.S. bribery law....

headline.main: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases
headline.print_headline: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases
